definitions: The ability to see something or to be seen from a particular place.
A sight or prospect, typically of attractive natural scenery, that can be seen from a particular place.
A particular way of considering or regarding something; an attitude or opinion.
An act of seeing or examining something.
examples: The house has a beautiful view of the sea.
In my view, he is the best candidate.
The police took a closer view of the evidence.
The room offers a panoramic view of the city.
